org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports.runtime

Class GroupColumn

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports.runtime.Column
      • org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports.runtime.GroupColumn

  • public class GroupColumn
extends Column
    a column with subcolumns. The column has no cells of its own. An instance can be either mutable or immutable, depending on the used constructor. Once frozen, an instance cannot be unfrozen
